<wiki:video url="http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=VUBwM4DRWG4"/>


== License Options (Pay-per-Minute or Volume Flatrate) ==

The user can buy either minutes and every time he enters a conference room a counter will start and his profile will be updated.
It is not possible to cheat by accessing a Room with the same account at the same time.

Sending Invitations or creating Scheduled Meetings via the Calendar is not possible for Pay-per-Minute Users. Otherwise those Users could send themself a invitation and in that way get unlimited access to meeting rooms.
